desc: Our coffee is the freshest coffee you can buy online. We will ship the coffee the same day we roast it direct to you. Choose from a variety of origins to taste the coffee flavors of the world.

layout.text: Great Things Happen with Great Coffee!

AT BLACK & SOME COFFEE CO., WE BELIEVE THAT GREAT COFFEE CAN FUEL A GREATER PURPOSE. THROUGH THE SALE OF OUR ORGANIC AND ECO-FRIENDLY SPECIALTY COFFEES, WE SUPPORT LITERACY INITIATIVES AND ORGANIZATIONS PROVIDING RESOURCES TO TEACHERS TO GIVE FREE BOOKS AND SUPPLIES TO LOW-INCOME STUDENTS. 5% OF ALL BLACK & SOME PROFITS ARE DEPLOYED TO FIRST BOOK AND ADOPT-A-CLASSROOM.ORG TO HELP CLASSROOMS IN NEED.
